component.name: Lohit Devanagari
component.summary: Lohit family font supporting all languages using Devanagari script

description.p: This package provides a free Devanagari Script TrueType font.
This package provides a free Devanagari script truetype/opentype font. Support Marathi, Hindi, Konkani, Maithili, Sindhi, Kashmiri, Nepali, Dogri and Santali languages.
